title: Bug 6410File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: Bug 6410File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
OB: The file is marked as dirtied even though it has not been changed, and the code assist feature does not appear.
EB: If the code assist feature has nothing to suggest, it should not mark the file as dirtied.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open a file in the code editor.
2. Enable the code assist feature.
3. Ensure that the file is unchanged.
4. Trigger the code assist functionality.
5. Verify that the file is marked as dirtied even though there were no changes made.
